doc: issue with aspect ratio & resolution when used with fullscreen API
Getting around to updating my raw2sculpt project to the latest Three.js & JavaScript goodness after watching stuff on Google I/O last night, ran into an issue with the fullscreen API.

I've _partially_ fixed the aspect ratio problems I was having thanks to snippets in issue #69, but it seems the code I've written to attempt to change the render resolution when switching between the small (static) tile and fullscreen (animated) window doesn't seem to work.
